__TOC__

== Ubuntu Touch Apps ==

To help developers find how to do things already done within other apps.

=== System Apps ===

The system apps are all related to phablet:

https://launchpad.net/~phablet-team/+related-projects

=== Core Apps ===

The core apps are managed by the umbrella project:

https://launchpad.net/ubuntu-phone-coreapps

=== Community Apps ===

Please add your own community apps here:

==== Whosthere (Telepathy-based WhatsApp client) ====

https://launchpad.net/whosthere - Project site

https://github.com/mgehre/whosthere - UI

https://github.com/mgehre/telepathy-whosthere - telepathy bridge

https://github.com/mgehre/yowsup - python library backend

https://github.com/mgehre/telepathy-qt - Qt telepathy bindings

==== Google reader client ====

https://github.com/JimiSmith/UPReader

==== Comics ====

https://code.launchpad.net/~payload/comics-mockup

==== Reddit ====

https://github.com/brambram/UbuntuPhoneRedditApp

==== exfm ====

Scales to multi columns on wide views (desktop), and tabs on narrow (phone)

https://code.launchpad.net/~sil/+junk/exfm-ubuntu

==== Catchpodder (a podcast client) ====

https://launchpad.net/catchpodder
